m_szDocSumamry: Solar Panels Or Greenery For Every New Building Rooftop In France March 22nd, 2015 by Jake Richardson   A new law was approved in France recently that requires  the rooftops of every new building in a commercial zone to be partially covered with either solar panels or plants. Environmental activists in France wanted all new buildings to be completely covered by plants or solar panels, but the French government only went about halfway to that point.
